mapper.select: /* 사용자 아이디,비밀번호 체크 selectLoginUser */ select user_id ,user_name ,business_code ,bpart_code ,mpart_code ,spart_code ,user_level ,nvl(user_level_cd, ' ') as user_level_cd ,eval_yn ,nvl(pass_expire_date, '') as pass_expire_date ,nvl(pass_upd_date, '') as pass_upd_date ,to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as login_datm ,fn_GetCodeName('USER_LEVEL', user_level) as level_name ,nvl(user_ip, '') as user_ip ,(case when login_chk_datm is not null then trunc(sysdate - login_chk_datm) else 0 end ) as login_check_day ,(case when pass_expire_date is not null then trunc(to_date(pass_expire_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') - sysdate) else 0 end ) as pass_check_day ,' ' as down_ip ,nvl(rec_down_yn, ' ') as rec_down_yn ,nvl(lock_yn, '0') as lock_yn ,nvl(resign_yn, '0') as resign_yn ,nvl(use_yn,' ') as use_yn from tbl_user where 1=1 and user_id = #{login_id} and user_pass = #{login_pass}

/* 사용자 아이디,비밀번호 체크 selectAutoLoginUser */ select user_id ,user_name ,business_code ,bpart_code ,mpart_code ,spart_code ,user_level ,nvl(user_level_cd, ' ') as user_level_cd ,eval_yn ,nvl(pass_expire_date, ' ') as pass_expire_date ,nvl(pass_upd_date, ' ') as pass_upd_date ,to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as login_datm ,fn_GetCodeName('USER_LEVEL', user_level) as level_name ,nvl(user_ip, ' ') as user_ip ,(case when login_chk_datm is not null then trunc(sysdate - login_chk_datm) else 0 end ) as login_check_day ,(case when pass_expire_date is not null then trunc(to_date(pass_expire_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') - sysdate) else 0 end ) as pass_check_day ,' ' as down_ip ,nvl(rec_down_yn, ' ') as rec_down_yn ,nvl(lock_yn, '0') as lock_yn ,nvl(resign_yn, '0') as resign_yn ,nvl(use_yn,' ') as use_yn from tbl_user where user_id = #{login_id} and lock_yn = '0' and resign_yn = '0' and use_yn = '1'

/* 사용자 아이디,비밀번호 체크 selectSSOLoginUser */ select user_id ,user_name ,business_code ,bpart_code ,mpart_code ,spart_code ,user_level ,eval_yn ,nvl(pass_expire_date, '') as pass_expire_date ,nvl(pass_upd_date, '') as pass_upd_date ,to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as login_date ,fn_GetCodeName('USER_LEVEL', user_level) as level_name ,nvl(user_ip, '') as user_ip ,(case when login_chk_datm is not null then trunc(sysdate - login_chk_datm) else 0 end ) as login_check_day ,(case when pass_expire_date is not null then trunc(to_date(pass_expire_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') - sysdate) else 0 end ) as pass_check_day ,'' as down_ip ,rec_down_yn ,lock_yn ,resign_yn ,use_yn from tbl_user where user_id = #{login_id}
